column2: Reliques I
column3: Reliques I

column2: Thank God, you are here, Commander.
column3: Thank God, you are here, Commander.

column2: If you can take down the defensive and capture the base, We can meet up and discuss business..
column3: If you can take down the defensive and capture the base, We can meet up and discuss business..

column2: We got caught outside of our mechs and have been brought here for 'Safe Keeping'.
column3: We got caught outside of our mechs and have been brought here for 'Safe Keeping'.

column2: I think you will like what we found, Thank you for the Rescue.
column3: I think you will like what we found, Thank you for the Rescue.

column2: Were glad to be of assistance.
column3: Were glad to be of assistance.

column2: I will send communications asap, once we get situated.
column3: I will send communications asap, once we get situated.

column2: We will head back to the Argos, Try not to be kidnaped in the meantime.
column3: We will head back to the Argos, Try not to be kidnaped in the meantime.

column2: Sorry Commander, The base defenses were just to much.
column3: Sorry Commander, The base defenses were just to much.

column2: Bogeys on sensors!
column3: На радарах что то есть!

column2: [GENERIC VO] Area is not clear, Commander. Eliminate the hostiles before continuing to the next Objective.
column3: [GENERIC VO] Район занят противником, командир. Устраните врагов, прежде чем перейти к следующей цели.

column2: [GENERIC VO] Sensors are clear, proceed to the next objective.
column3: [GENERIC VO] На радарах чисто, приступаем к следующей задаче.

column2: Our ride has arrived, Thank you for the assist Commander.
column3: Our ride has arrived, Thank you for the assist Commander.

column2: They are very stubborn in their attempt to keep me here. Those are some pretty big guns Commander
column3: They are very stubborn in their attempt to keep me here. Those are some pretty big guns Commander

column2: This doesn't look good. They must know what I have found.
column3: This doesn't look good. They must know what I have found.

column2: Hopefully we can wrap this up before the Local government gets involved.
column3: Hopefully we can wrap this up before the Local government gets involved.

column2: Seems the Pirates are after something here. And they have come in full force.
column3: Seems the Pirates are after something here. And they have come in full force.

column2: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.
column3: The objective to scout the base that is being captured. Must be completed before the actual capture of the base.

column2: Scout the Facility
column3: Scout the Facility

column2: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.
column3: The objective to optionally destroy the defenders of the base.

column2: Destroy the Defenders
column3: Уничтожьте защитников

column2: The objective for the player to move into and capture the base.
column3: The objective for the player to move into and capture the base.

column2: Capture the Base with Friendly 'Mechs
column3: Захватить базу совместно с дружественными мехами

column2: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.
column3: HIDDEN TIMER, NO NEED TO EDIT: This is the hidden timer objective that will trigger the enemy reinforcements.

column2: Hold Out as Enemies Counter-Attack
column3: Hold Out as Enemies Counter-Attack

column2: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.
column3: This is a general objective to indicate the player must keep playing and eliminate enemies as they come.

column2: Pacify the Area around the Base
column3: Pacify the Area around the Base

column2: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.
column3: The primary objective to destroy the force that tries to remove the player from the captured base.

column2: Destroy the Enemy Reinforcements
column3: Уничтожьте подкрепление врага

column2: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.
column3: The chunk controlled objective to destroy the turrets for the base, if the chunk is active.

column2: Eliminate Base Turrets
column3: Устранение турелей на базе

column2: Commander, It seems our employer has been cornered in. We may have to get them out of there hiding spot before we talk to them.
column3: Командир, похоже, наш работодатель загнан в угол. Возможно, нам придется вытащить их из окружения, прежде чем мы с ними поговорим.

column2: Reliques II
column3: Reliques II

column2: Commander, you arrived just in time. Those pirates are almost upon us.
column3: Командир, вы прибыли как раз вовремя. Эти пираты почти достали нас.

column2: Interstellar Expeditions has provided us with the technicians we need to get this base back up and running.
column3: Interstellar Expeditions has provided us with the technicians we need to get this base back up and running.

column2: Lets hold this line so we can get these artifacts off world.
column3: Lets hold this line so we can get these artifacts off world.

column2: There are some very unique things buried under this complex.
column3: There are some very unique things buried under this complex.

column2: Great work commander. Lets meet up and discuss payment.
column3: Great work commander. Lets meet up and discuss payment.

column2: No, oh No, everything is lost. Interstellar Expeditions will not be happy with this
column3: No, oh No, everything is lost. Interstellar Expeditions will not be happy with this

column2: Turrets online, IE will be happy with the results.
column3: Turrets online, IE will be happy with the results.

column2: Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from multiple vectors. Looks like the attacking force has brought reinforcements.
column3: Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from multiple vectors. Looks like the attacking force has brought reinforcements.

column2: No, No, No. These things are old and fragile, they can't be shaken like this.
column3: No, No, No. These things are old and fragile, they can't be shaken like this.

column2: Hundreds of years of research lost in just a mere moment.
column3: Hundreds of years of research lost in just a mere moment.

column2: We have almost lost all of this find Commander.
column3: We have almost lost all of this find Commander.

column2: We are halfway loaded Commander. Keep up the good work
column3: We are halfway loaded Commander. Keep up the good work

column2: Commander, on this outing we have some additional support from our employer.
column3: Командир, в этой походе у нас есть дополнительная поддержка со стороны нашего работодателя.

column2: They have point defenses set up around the base. However, they are off-line.
column3: They have point defenses set up around the base. However, they are off-line.

column2: We have a friendly convoy with engineers who are eager to get at those defenses, so they can bring them online.
column3: We have a friendly convoy with engineers who are eager to get at those defenses, so they can bring them online.

column2: Escort them safely to the generators and we can boost our defensive capability with those turrets activated. Good luck!
column3: Escort them safely to the generators and we can boost our defensive capability with those turrets activated. Good luck!

column2: Looks like the Pirates have brought in the 5th fleet commander.
column3: Looks like the Pirates have brought in the 5th fleet commander.

column2: Defend Targeted Base Structures from Attackers
column3: Защита целевых базовых структур от нападающих

column2: Defend the Target Buildings
column3: Защитите целевые здания

column2: Destroy the enemy vanguard force, the first wave.
column3: Уничтожьте авангард врага, первой волны.

column2: Destroy the Pirate Vanguard
column3: Уничтожьте пиратский авангард

column2: Optional objective to keep ALL target structures intact.
column3: Optional objective to keep ALL target structures intact.

column2: Defend ALL Target Buildings from Destruction
column3: Защитите ВСЕ целевые здания от разрушения

column2: Objective for tracking the time left in the mission. While the player it told to Hold Out for Reinforcements
column3: Objective for tracking the time left in the mission. While the player it told to Hold Out for Reinforcements

column2: Hold Out for Reinforcements
column3: Hold Out for Reinforcements

column2: Escort Engineer APCs to Base Defenses in order to take control of them.
column3: Escort Engineer APCs to Base Defenses in order to take control of them.

column2: Escort Engineer APCs to the Base Defenses
column3: Escort Engineer APCs to the Base Defenses

column2: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Second Lance
column3: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Second Lance

column2: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Second Lance
column3: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Second Lance

column2: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance
column3: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance

column2: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance
column3: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance

column2: Davion Forces Inbound
column3: Силы Дэвиона прибывают

column2: Hold of the pirates while we secure the assets here.
column3: Hold of the pirates while we secure the assets here.

column2: Reliques II
column3: Reliques II

column2: You're coming up on the local government facility, Commander.
column3: You're coming up on the local government facility, Commander.

column2: It seems lightly defended.
column3: It seems lightly defended.

column2: Once you've reached the facility and picked up the pilot, move to the LZ.
column3: Once you've reached the facility and picked up the pilot, move to the LZ.

column2: We will come get you Stat!
column3: We will come get you Stat!

column2: We got him commander! Thank you!
column3: We got him commander! Thank you!

column2: The pilot's in bad shape and needs a medical, ASAP.
column3: The pilot's in bad shape and needs a medical, ASAP.

column2: I hope he is going to be ok.
column3: I hope he is going to be ok.

column2: Our friend barely made it. I hope our employer doesn't push this specialist too hard.
column3: Our friend barely made it. I hope our employer doesn't push this specialist too hard.

column2: IE is going to be real unhappy about this.
column3: IE is going to be real unhappy about this.

column2: Our men will load the specialist up for you and tend to their injuries. Thank you, Commander.
column3: Our men will load the specialist up for you and tend to their injuries. Thank you, Commander.

column2: [GENERIC VO] The asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
column3: [GENERIC VO] Груз получает урон, командир!

column2: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset is sustaining damage, Commander!
column3: [GENERIC VO] Второстепенный груз получает урон, командир!

column2: [GENERIC VO] The asset has been recovered, Commander. Good work.
column3: [GENERIC VO] Груз был возвращен, командир. Хорошая работа.

column2: [GENERIC VO] The secondary asset has been recovered, Commander.
column3: [GENERIC VO] Второй груз был возвращен, командир.

column2: Mission failure. I'll notify IE.
column3: Mission failure. I'll notify IE.

column2: Specialized Pilot?
column3: Specialized Pilot?

column2: The objective for the player to retrieve the primary target.
column3: The objective for the player to retrieve the primary target.

column2: Recover the Pilot by Securing the Designated Area
column3: Recover the Pilot by Securing the Designated Area

column2: UNUSED KILL OBJECTIVE for AutoComplete
column3: UNUSED KILL OBJECTIVE for AutoComplete

column2: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for OpFor1
column3: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for OpFor1

column2: The objective to escape with all player units.
column3: The objective to escape with all player units.

column2: Get to the Evac Zone
column3: Get to the Evac Zone

column2: The objective to keep the unit which is carrying the primary target alive. Player will fail if it is destroyed.
column3: The objective to keep the unit which is carrying the primary target alive. Player will fail if it is destroyed.

column2: Ensure the Primary Asset Recovery Unit Survives
column3: Убедитесь, что подразделение по восстановлению первичных активов выживает

column2: We can't leave technology like this in their hands.
column3: We can't leave technology like this in their hands.

column2: Recover the Pilot's Gear by Securing the Secondary Designated Area
column3: Recover the Pilot's Gear by Securing the Secondary Designated Area

column2: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for autocomplete of mission
column3: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for autocomplete of mission

column2: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for OpFor2
column3: Hidden KILL OBJECTIVE for OpFor2

column2: The objective to keep the unit which is carrying the secondary target alive. The player can fail this objective.
column3: The objective to keep the unit which is carrying the secondary target alive. The player can fail this objective.

column2: Ensure the Secondary Asset Recovery Unit Survives
column3: Ensure the Secondary Asset Recovery Unit Survives

column2: We need to pick up a specialized pilot for the next mission. They were separated from us and the IE and they're mission critical to this operation. I'm sure this will pay off.
column3: We need to pick up a specialized pilot for the next mission. They were separated from us and the IE and they're mission critical to this operation. I'm sure this will pay off.

column2: Reliques III
column3: Reliques III

column2: Just point me at them. I am not use to flying, so this will be quite the experience.
column3: Just point me at them. I am not use to flying, so this will be quite the experience.

column2: Looks like we have two of them, just as predicted. Should get some good data out of this.
column3: Looks like we have two of them, just as predicted. Should get some good data out of this.

column2: Be careful out there. running solo is always a risk.
column3: Будьте осторожны там. Один в поле не воин.

column2: I got this. I owe it to IE to get the data on this ancient battlemech.
column3: I got this. I owe it to IE to get the data on this ancient battlemech.

column2: I was flying, Commander! Flying! They never saw me coming. Pew! Pew! Pew!
column3: I was flying, Commander! Flying! They never saw me coming. Pew! Pew! Pew!

column2: I wrecked it. I'll talk to you when I'm back onboard, Commander.
column3: I wrecked it. I'll talk to you when I'm back onboard, Commander.

column2: A primary target is damaged, Commander! Keep it up!
column3: Основная цель повреждена, командир! Так держать!

column2: Always wanted to be a MechCommander.
column3: Всегда хотел быть командиром мехов.

column2: The primary objective to destroy the enemy lance.
column3: The primary objective to destroy the enemy lance.

column2: Destroy the Pirate
column3: Уничтожить пирата

column2: An OPTIONAL primary objective to destroy the second enemy lance.
column3: НЕОБЯЗАТЕЛЬНАЯ основная цель - уничтожить второе копье противника.

column2: Destroy the Second  Pirate
column3: Уничтожьте второго пирата

column2: Alright, Commander. I'd like to give this data collection mission a try. We have a small group of pirates and I'll ambush them. I need you as my eyes in the sky. You direct the fire and I'll bring it down.
column3: Хорошо, командир. Я хотел бы попробовать эту миссию по сбору данных. У нас есть небольшая группа пиратов, и я устрою им засаду. Ты мне нужен как мои глаза в небе. Вы наведёте меня, а я нанесу удар.

column2: Sharon Bryan, an up and comming officer in Steiner, has requested our aid.
column3: Sharon Bryan, an up and comming officer in Steiner, has requested our aid.

column2: Reliques
column3: Reliques
